item.title: gorm API
item.description: 原文：https://pkg.go.dev/gorm.io/gorm@v1.25.10 The fantastic ORM library for Golang, aims to be developer friendly. Overview Full-Featured ORM Associations (Has One, Has Many, Belongs To, Many To Many, Polymorphism, Single-table inheritance)
